name: Smokesoul
summary: You have a connection to smoke and haze.
description:
You have a connection to smoke and haze. You gain the Smoke Blending reaction.

 Smoke Blending     (sylph) Trigger A creature attempts a flat check to target you because you're concealed or hidden due to fog, haze, mist, or smoke; Effect You shroud yourself in smoke, making it harder for your foe to hit you. If you're concealed, the DC of the flat check increases from 5 to 7; if you're hidden, it increases from 11 to 13.Traits

Lineage: A feat with this trait indicates a character's descendance from a particular type of creature. You can have only one lineage feat. You can select a lineage feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of these feats.

Sylph: Sylphs are planar scions descended from djinn.
